author: Josh Powell
description: Just as the name suggests, only the beetroot pervades this otherwise classic Daiquiri more than the vanilla. Consider using vanilla-infused rum.
name: Beetroot & Vanilla Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
